item.description:
Good news everyone! 
This months book is one that has been on our to-read list for a while; The Windup Girl by Paolo Bacigalupi is a biopunk book about a post-apocalyptic Earth where natural resouces are scarce and people use genesplicing to accomplish what oil used to. This book won the 2009 Nebula and the 2010 Hugo for its amazing world building and story.

I am putting the Meetup location as Pandemonium but if I find a new place I will update the location. There is a lot around the corner from Pandemonium  Rodney's on Green Street ($8 for the night). There is also T access and bus connections.

See you there! 
-Josh

**EDIT** We have a new place to meetup!! Rodney's Bookstore got back to me and we will try out meeting there this month.
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually upstairs in the stacks (but sometimes we are downstairs).
item.name: March Book Club Meeting
